bug.summary: CVAT new ui: annotations are not displayed from the first time in Firefox after upload
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Annotations are displayed from the first time. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Annotations are displayed from the second time. <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Create a task Annotate an image Save Go to the task page (back) Dump (I used COCO, but shouldn't matter) Open annotation page Remove all annotations Save Go to the task page (back) Upload Open annotations page - no annotations Refresh - annotations are there
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
The first server response contains annotations, so they are actually uploaded. Feels like some caching issues. <denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
